https://tmrev.io/movie/99-All About My Mother 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hjQhzhkGYXPNM96k0mOgob6HMmn.jpg Following the tragic death of her teenage son, Manuela travels from Madrid to Barcelona in an attempt to contact the long-estranged father the boy never knew. She reunites with an old friend, an outspoken transgender sex worker, and befriends a troubled actress and a pregnant, HIV-positive nun. All About My Mother
